name: Live Cat Viewer
body:
# Live Cat Viewer - Kitten Academy
A live stream viewer created for viewing the kitten academy live-stream. I created this because I was really enjoying the kitten academy live stream, additionally I can't have cats in my apartment; this really is the next best thing.

This software was made in a very short period of time, expect bugs, report them.

## This software was built freely for, with permission:
http://kitten.academy/

The application is not sponsored by Kitten Academy.

The project is licensed in this way:
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

The licence file is in the project, and supplied in all the builds.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
